summary: Adds the beautiful and capeable Lady Tamriel, as well as her love and guardian, Auron.
descriptionHtml:
***Please browse through entire description****  It\'s all important!

**Please be advised**  This is my first time releasing one of my follower mods, I normally make them just for me, and so I need someone brave to test the waters for me, to see if I\'ve done what it takes to make this run on other peoples skyrim set ups!

If it turns out that I did this right and they work for you and not just me, PLEASE Endorse, and I will take the time to learn to do more extensive things and you can look forward to many more follower mods in the future.

UFO is optional of course, but you will need it to get both followers to follow you at once.

NPC\'s are found at Honningbrew meadery - they cannot be married as they are married to eachother.



This Mod REQUIRES!!!!:



Apachii Sky Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?

The Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?

Pretty Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887//?

Tera Armor Collection - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846//?    (needs to be this one! can\'t be any other tera armor mod.  Having others installed is okay, but this one needs to be as well)



**Optional/Unsure if needed or not**-- I use them, and am not sure if your skyrim will demand them, or use your textures and meshes instead.

For the followers to look exactly like they do in the screen shot I am using the following:


Apachii Hair, Natural Retexture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092//?

Better Males - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488//?

Mature skin texture and body for UNP - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986//?

Demonized UNP - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?



And last but not least, everything is portrayed beautifully by Sharpshooters ENB



The Mods Lore:



Lady Tamriel is mostly unheard of, Born of a royal blood line lost to the history books due to generations of betrayal.  Her parents long dead she travels now with the love of her life, and sword protector Auron.  You\'ve met them before... in your journeys before finding yourself lost in skyrim among it\'s cival war and turmoil.  The three of you have all taken turns saving each others lives, and you all miss each other dear.

Lady Tamriel and Auron heard that you were in skyrim, and have come to find you, knowing you need no savior, they have instead come to reminisce over a drink at the Honningbrew meadery near Whiterun.  Meet them there, and you may yet again relive the good old days.
author: MattBeer aka Incarnum

files.name: The Ladys Heart Main File
files.changelogHtml: fixed an issue where Lady Tamriel's upper half was a black woman and her lower half was a white woman.
